version_description:
- Improved RTL language support
- Various UI tweaks and under the hood improvements
- Preparing for something big!
Fixed a crash when closing the app

Fixed sync failure sometimes being wrongly reported even on successful syncs
Fixed a crash when detecting country on signup
Changed links to now open in the user’s default browser
Removed 3 steps on-boarding
Various other fixes and improvements

- Improved RTL language support
- Various UI tweaks and under the hood improvements
- Preparing for something big!
Fixed a crash when closing the app

Fixed sync failure sometimes being wrongly reported even on successful syncs
Fixed a crash when detecting country on signup
Changed links to now open in the user’s default browser
Removed 3 steps on-boarding
Various other fixes and improvements

- Added reports

- Fixed Asian keyboard input adding too many characters
- Fixed app freezing when starting/stopping/continuing for some users
- Fixed timer not updating correctly, leading to crash when using start/stop button

- Improved autocompletion and suggestions in a number of small ways
- Improved handling of errors when pulling data
- Improved syncing to report errors faster
- Improved animations of time entry details view

- Various other UI fixes and improvements

- Added reports

- Fixed Asian keyboard input adding too many characters
- Fixed app freezing when starting/stopping/continuing for some users
- Fixed timer not updating correctly, leading to crash when using start/stop button

- Improved autocompletion and suggestions in a number of small ways
- Improved handling of errors when pulling data
- Improved syncing to report errors faster
- Improved animations of time entry details view

- Various other UI fixes and improvements

- Added automatic syncing when getting back to the app after at least a few minutes
- Added highlight for current day in reports calendar
- Added loading animation to reports

- Fixed crash when tapping "this year" in reports calendar
- Fixed continued time entries not always being in the correct workspace
- Fixed multiple projects showing as 'no project' in reports
- Fixed projects not being sorted alphabetically

- Improved feedback on syncing errors
- Various other UI and technical fixes and improvements

- Added automatic syncing when getting back to the app after at least a few minutes
- Added highlight for current day in reports calendar
- Added loading animation to reports

- Fixed crash when tapping "this year" in reports calendar
- Fixed continued time entries not always being in the correct workspace
- Fixed multiple projects showing as 'no project' in reports
- Fixed projects not being sorted alphabetically

- Improved feedback on syncing errors
- Various other UI and technical fixes and improvements

We recently did an oopsie that caused crashes on startup for some of our users.
This update fixes that (and some other things)!

- Fixed app crashing when opening from background
- Fixed app crashing when opening the settings page
- Fixed a glitch where the top bar would disappear sometimes

We recently did an oopsie that caused crashes on startup for some of our users.
This update fixes that (and some other things)!

- Fixed app crashing when opening from background
- Fixed app crashing when opening the settings page
- Fixed a glitch where the top bar would disappear sometimes

Just a couple bug fixes and behind-the-scenes improvements in this one, but there will be much more in the future! :)
In the meantime, always feel free to let us know what you think and send us feedback and suggestions at support@toggl.com

- Fixes tags not copying when continuing a time entry sometimes
- Fixed crash when using password manager to login
- Improved stability of loading time entries

Just a couple bug fixes and behind-the-scenes improvements in this one, but there will be much more in the future! :)
In the meantime, always feel free to let us know what you think and send us feedback and suggestions at support@toggl.com

- Fixes tags not copying when continuing a time entry sometimes
- Fixed crash when using password manager to login
- Improved stability of loading time entries

This update includes some changes and new features that we've been working on for a while. Thank you for your invaluable feedback, reporting issues and suggesting improvements!

The full set of changes is much too long to list, but here is an overview of the major things:

- Added onboarding hints for main features
- Added 3d touch shortcuts to Toggl app icon
- Added confirmation when discarding changes to a time entry
- Added client names to reports

- Fixed date/time picker wrongly jumping to Jan 1/Dec 31
- Fixed date/time picker not respecting 12/24h setting
- Fixed iOS auto-correction not working when creating time entries

- Improved a lot of technical things under the hood
- Various big and small UI fixes and improvements

This update includes some changes and new features that we've been working on for a while. Thank you for your invaluable feedback, reporting issues and suggesting improvements!

The full set of changes is much too long to list, but here is an overview of the major things:

- Added onboarding hints for main features
- Added 3d touch shortcuts to Toggl app icon
- Added confirmation when discarding changes to a time entry
- Added client names to reports

- Fixed date/time picker wrongly jumping to Jan 1/Dec 31
- Fixed date/time picker not respecting 12/24h setting
- Fixed iOS auto-correction not working when creating time entries

- Improved a lot of technical things under the hood
- Various big and small UI fixes and improvements

This update mostly changes things under the hood, but there are also a couple of user-facing things:

- Update signup and login UI
- Group small segments on report's pie chart
- Various smaller fixes and improvements

This update mostly changes things under the hood, but there are also a couple of user-facing things:

- Update signup and login UI
- Group small segments on report's pie chart
- Various smaller fixes and improvements

Not much to see here. This update fixes a rare bug, makes all projects be listed under the reports pie-chart again, and improves a couple of other minor things.

- Fixed bug caused by users not having a default workspace set
- Fixed reports to not group projects in the list under the pie chart
- Disabled buggy auto correction
- Improved new signup/login screen layout

Not much to see here. This update fixes a rare bug, makes all projects be listed under the reports pie-chart again, and improves a couple of other minor things.

- Fixed bug caused by users not having a default workspace set
- Fixed reports to not group projects in the list under the pie chart
- Disabled buggy auto correction
- Improved new signup/login screen layout

This update fixes a number of small issues that have crept in over the last few releases. Special thanks to everyone who got in touch to report any issues!

- Fixed version not showing correctly in settings view
- Fixed help button not working correctly
- Fixed back button not working in forgot-password view
- Fixed duration sometimes being shown with an ellipsis in the time edit view
- Fixed rare crash on startup
- Fixed time entry log not updating correctly when continuing a time entry while a timer was already running
- Fixed some animation issues with the start button and running timer that led to the start button not appearing sometimes

This update fixes a number of small issues that have crept in over the last few releases. Special thanks to everyone who got in touch to report any issues!

- Fixed version not showing correctly in settings view
- Fixed help button not working correctly
- Fixed back button not working in forgot-password view
- Fixed duration sometimes being shown with an ellipsis in the time edit view
- Fixed rare crash on startup
- Fixed time entry log not updating correctly when continuing a time entry while a timer was already running
- Fixed some animation issues with the start button and running timer that led to the start button not appearing sometimes

This one's simple. We had a few of you getting random crashes recently, including a couple of cases where the app didn't start at all anymore! Well, those should be gone now. Back to tracking!

- Fixed crashes related to the app accidentally having two running time entries

This one's simple. We had a few of you getting random crashes recently, including a couple of cases where the app didn't start at all anymore! Well, those should be gone now. Back to tracking!

- Fixed crashes related to the app accidentally having two running time entries

This update contains countless updates to the interface, as well as under the hood. Here are the highlights:

- Added long-press action to start button to toggle manual mode
- Added color hints to the wheel of time
- Added tag and billable icons to time entry log
- Added new and updated custom feedback UI

- Improved tag and project tokens and performance in the start view

- Eleven other UI fixes and countless improvements under the hood

This update contains countless updates to the interface, as well as under the hood. Here are the highlights:

- Added long-press action to start button to toggle manual mode
- Added color hints to the wheel of time
- Added tag and billable icons to time entry log
- Added new and updated custom feedback UI

- Improved tag and project tokens and performance in the start view

- Eleven other UI fixes and countless improvements under the hood

This update includes some under-the-hood bug fixes and improvements.
This update includes some under-the-hood bug fixes and improvements.

This is a big update! The highlights are that you can now UNDO deleting time entries in the log and select workspaces in reports, but there have been a great number of other smaller changes as well.

- Added UNDO prompt when deleting time entries by swiping
- Added workspace selection to reports
- Added billable and tag icons to time entries in log
- Added tabs to navigate between time entry log and reports

- Fixed crash when user does not have any workspaces
- Improved performance of main time entry log view

- 14 Other fixes and improvements

This is a big update! The highlights are that you can now UNDO deleting time entries in the log and select workspaces in reports, but there have been a great number of other smaller changes as well.

- Added UNDO prompt when deleting time entries by swiping
- Added workspace selection to reports
- Added billable and tag icons to time entries in log
- Added tabs to navigate between time entry log and reports

- Fixed crash when user does not have any workspaces
- Improved performance of main time entry log view

- 14 Other fixes and improvements

This update is all about stability. We've improved a bunch of subtle, technical things under the hood that get rid of a number of issues and improve syncing your data, especially on slower or unreliable networks.

- Fixed several bugs which can occur on slow networks (e.g., EDGE)
- Fixed a glitch with the workspace selection button in reports
- Fixed several glitches on the login and sign-up screens
- Fixed the calculation of total time tracked for each day on the main screen

- Improved stability and the synchronization with our servers

This update is all about stability. We've improved a bunch of subtle, technical things under the hood that get rid of a number of issues and improve syncing your data, especially on slower or unreliable networks.

- Fixed several bugs which can occur on slow networks (e.g., EDGE)
- Fixed a glitch with the workspace selection button in reports
- Fixed several glitches on the login and sign-up screens
- Fixed the calculation of total time tracked for each day on the main screen

- Improved stability and the synchronization with our servers

It's time for iOS 12. And with that, we are happy to announce that if you have updated to iOS 12, your Toggl app now integrates with Siri Shortcuts!
You can set up shortcuts to open reports, and start and stop your timer, and there will be more exciting features coming in the future.

- Added Siri Shortcuts integration
- Improved syncing when deleting time entries
- Various smaller improvements

It's time for iOS 12. And with that, we are happy to announce that if you have updated to iOS 12, your Toggl app now integrates with Siri Shortcuts!
You can set up shortcuts to open reports, and start and stop your timer, and there will be more exciting features coming in the future.

- Added Siri Shortcuts integration
- Improved syncing when deleting time entries
- Various smaller improvements

This is a big one! We've added an entirely new way to show, create and edit time entries by integration with your phone's calendar.

- Added the brand new calendar integration. Now you can:
- View time entries alongside events from selected calendars
- Create new time entries from calendar events
- Create new time entries by dragging on the calendar view
- Edit new time entries with a tap and hold gesture
- Receive notifications before a calendar event starts (check the settings)

Other:
- Improved Siri Shortcuts integration, you can now start time entries including projects and tags

This is a big one! We've added an entirely new way to show, create and edit time entries by integration with your phone's calendar.

- Added the brand new calendar integration. Now you can:
- View time entries alongside events from selected calendars
- Create new time entries from calendar events
- Create new time entries by dragging on the calendar view
- Edit new time entries with a tap and hold gesture
- Receive notifications before a calendar event starts (check the settings)

Other:
- Improved Siri Shortcuts integration, you can now start time entries including projects and tags

A big new update is here! Featuring, the all-new Calendar integration. Now you can:
- View time entries and events from the selected calendars alongside
- Create new time entries from calendar events
- Create new time entries by dragging on the calendar view
- Edit new time entries with a tap and hold gesture
- Receive notifications before a calendar event starts

Other than that, in this update we:
- Improved Siri Shortcuts integration, allowing you to create time entries that can now include project and tag information
- Fixed a crash when creating new time entries without a description using Siri Shortcuts
- Fixed the headers showing the incorrect date in the main log
- Fixed a crash in the onboarding process
- Fixed a rare crash in the calendar view when the current time indicator was updated
- Fixed a glitch with the current time indicator in the calendar view
- Fixed the text color in the calendar items description to have contrast with the background

A big new update is here! Featuring, the all-new Calendar integration. Now you can:
- View time entries and events from the selected calendars alongside
- Create new time entries from calendar events
- Create new time entries by dragging on the calendar view
- Edit new time entries with a tap and hold gesture
- Receive notifications before a calendar event starts

Other than that, in this update we:
- Improved Siri Shortcuts integration, allowing you to create time entries that can now include project and tag information
- Fixed a crash when creating new time entries without a description using Siri Shortcuts
- Fixed the headers showing the incorrect date in the main log
- Fixed a crash in the onboarding process
- Fixed a rare crash in the calendar view when the current time indicator was updated
- Fixed a glitch with the current time indicator in the calendar view
- Fixed the text color in the calendar items description to have contrast with the background

This update fixes several bugs and makes some other small improvements. For details, see below.

- Improved calendar UI on smaller screens
- Added default suggestions for Siri shortcuts

- Fixed a bug making it impossible to get 1-year reports
- Fixed a bug where creating projects would not respect workspace settings

- And other minor improvements under the hood

- Fixed a bug making it impossible to get 1-year reports
- Fixed a bug where creating projects would not respect workspace settings

- And other minor improvements under the hood

This update brings a couple of UI improvements and bug fixes, as well as some major updates to our syncing algorithms and performance increases.

- Added 3D touch shortcut to open the calendar view
- Added the task name when starting time entries

- Improved app startup time
- Improved suggestions UI when starting time entries
- Improved performance in the time entries log UI
- Improved syncing when losing and gaining access to workspaces

- Fixed a bug when user's account doesn't have a default workspace
- Fixed sign up with Google
- Fixed crashes when using Estonian as the preferred language
- Fixed calendar view sometimes showing the wrong day

This update brings several fixes and improvements, most notably to the Calendar View and notifications. Use these features to make tracking time even easier!

- Added the running time entry to the Calendar View

- Improved the calendar view layout
- Improved time to open project selection view

- Fixed the calendar notification actions, it now starts a running time entry
- Fixed a crash when user doesn't have a default workspace

- Other bug fixes and improvements

- Added the running time entry to the Calendar View

- Improved the calendar view layout
- Improved time to open project selection view

- Fixed the calendar notification actions, it now starts a running time entry
- Fixed a crash when user doesn't have a default workspace

- Other bug fixes and improvements

- Added new features to the calendar page
- Added "Last year" shortcut to reports

- Improved synchronization with the server by syncing more frequently

- Fixed crashes when the language of the phone was set to Thai
- Fixed glitches on the calendar page
- Fixed spelling in several dialogues

- Many other improvements under the hood

This release is the preparation for something new!
This release is the preparation for something new!

Toggl is now Toggl Track!

We'll still be the Toggl you know and love on mobile, desktop, and web - but we're welcoming Toggl Plan and Toggl Hire into the family.

We're also changing our colors, shedding our classic tomato red for a cool new color scheme. And don't worry - our app and the functionality you depend on remains the same and will continue to be there for you - it will just look a bit more slicker.

Welcome to the new and improved Toggl Track App for iPhone! We’ve been hard at work to bring you a fresh design that is faster, smaller and full of features you’ll love. From seamless integration with Siri to iOS 14 widgets, our time tracking app will help you maximize your working hours—complete with powerful reports and simple time entry creation.

In this release, you’ll find:
- A brand new app, built from scratch
- Intuitively designed user interface
- iOS 14 widgets
- Faster sync, so you can view your data on Track’s web, mobile and desktop apps
- Apple sign-in, shortcuts, autocomplete, manual tracking mode and more!

Keep tabs on both your time and your bottom line with Toggl Track for iOS: the world's best time tracking software for individuals and businesses.
